website_summaries.verdict: Funko clearly cares about their source material, as their clan of Naruto figures are just as detailed, cute, and sturdily crafted as every other Funko Pop! toy.
pros: Charmingly stylized, yet surprisingly accurate sculpt of Kakashi
cons: Doesn’t include a stand, but Kakashi easily stands on his own

customer_reviews.title: Ripped box...
customer_reviews.text: Box was ripped and beat up. Would return but it's not worth the hassle. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars totally earned!
customer_reviews.text: I want to start saying that this is the first funko I've ever received that the box came in a plastic protector and it is hard (it protects a lot), they obviously thought about the customer fist and I appreciate this kind of stuff. You can see in the pictures that Kakashi looks awesome and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthmery Canales

customer_reviews.title: Box was damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bog was a little damaged but it was okay as the person who received the gift was happy nonetheless. The quality is the average POP quality....not painted well/chunky bits of paint residue/ painted outside of the "lines" but I guess if the person who got the gift is happy then that's good. I however will never buy this and be pleased with it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Karizma

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed box
customer_reviews.text: Beyond disappointed and pissed at the quality inn which I received this. I never rate or bother leaving things like for things I buy, but this left me furious! I get home and open it to find out it's completely trashed. Buy it elsewhere. Cause this is obviously unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: Felinto franca

customer_reviews.title: Kakashi can't stand up!
customer_reviews.text: I want an Itachi Funko but settled for Kakashi cause he's still a boss and they don't make many Naruto Funkos but this Funko can't stand up on it's own!
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL FIGURE
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pop viynl! Would definitely recommend to any collector or naruto lover!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t care about the box the POP comes in, it’s a great item!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the item the shipping box was in perfect shape but the box Kakashi is in is torn and scuffed up. I saw other reviews warning about this but decided to take the risk anyway. Gave 3 stars because Kakashi himself is in perfect condition so if you don’t care about the box, this is a wonderful item, I personally just keep mine in the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Williams

customer_reviews.title: Still great :)
customer_reviews.text: Box was in good condition. Didn’t come with a stand but honestly didn’t need it. I took these pictures on my bed and tested it out on my dresser and he can stand on a flat surface just fine. The paint finish was pretty good, minus a few spots on his headband, mask and hands. The logo on the back of his vest is a little misplaced but I’m just happy to have him in my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely flipped out over this figurine. She is big into the Anime scene, and although I don't know much about it, I was the worlds best dad on Christmas morning. So I checked them out and they are pretty well made and crafted, and I will definitely be expanding her collection.
customer_reviews.author: Silverbeard

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this one is super cool and his favorite now! My nephews thing lately is collecting funko's. Pretty cool looking Lil dude for sure. But they just stay in the box
customer_reviews.author: LA_Bullies

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for naruto fans
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pop figure and it’s not a cheap knock off so the quality it’s like usable, great. My husband loved it and he wants more now, what did I do to myself oh no 😅lol
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great, the only thing that was a little messed up was the package but I do not collect in the box so it did not matter that much to me. Great figure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ this naruto funko pop figure
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my daughter who could not find any naruto funko figures in stores. this was a great amazon find! funko pops are always well made, created and styled true to each character it represents. we hope to order more from the naruto collection.
customer_reviews.author: pn0rg@@rd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Condition
customer_reviews.text: Fulfillment was outstanding and the item was perfectly protected. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: In the future would like to see maybe the addition of Shikimaru, Zabuza, or Guy! But still very pleased, the paint was very well done.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dillard

customer_reviews.title: great Funko
customer_reviews.text: great Funko. I bought Kakashi along with Team 7 plus many many other Funko. Great buy. Great quality and it looks good on any tv stand!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Totally sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This was so colorful and my son will love it. Love that the packaging was wrapped in bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: pinky4squishy

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Looks exactly like the image. Funko definitely has room for improvement in quality assurance but this product had no discernible blemishes. Was well packaged and the box came undamaged. If you're a Naruto fan, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: frabjousdayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It came with the protection vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pop... it came with the protection vinyl. So the box is in perfect conditions
customer_reviews.author: Gloemo7

customer_reviews.title: Bad condition
customer_reviews.text: The box came all dented. Most people buy these to collect and coming in like that is worthless
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Box Completely Destroyed :(
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived mixed with other heavy weight orders unprotected and the box completely destroyed. For collectors this does not work. This is the first time this has happened to me and i am really disappointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzette

customer_reviews.title: Which made me mad but other than that it's perfect so you if you take yours out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged on the side , a little on the front and in the bottom . Which made me mad but other than that it's perfect so you if you take yours out of the box it's fine but I don't and that's why I'm a little mad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold??
customer_reviews.text: I mean, yeah the box was a little beat up- which is fine, I was planning to take Kakashi out and put him in my car. BUT what I was not counting on was fuzzy mold on his arm???!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Another damaged POP sold as new
customer_reviews.text: Crushed on the side and torn on the corner. Clearly not a new POP but sold as such with preexisting damage. Exterior shipping box was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Custominor

customer_reviews.title: Naruto
customer_reviews.text: My son is really into anime, especially naruto. He was very thrilled to have received this figurine. It’s well made and is a perfect addition to his growing anime collection.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewreader

customer_reviews.title: Kekashi Sensei is goals
customer_reviews.text: Kekashi Sensei is my inspiration. He is goals. He is the GOAT in Naruto. And he is the one who truly made an influence on Naruto. And because of this. I have taken my journey. And I will do my best to become the next Hokage of the Washington State. So that everyone will know my name. So that everyone will respect me. Believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cook

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is okay but the box the Kakashi ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is okay but the box the Kakashi funko pop came in was noticeably damaged. I gave this to someone as a gift and it was somewhat unpresentable because of the crushed box.
customer_reviews.author: Gylen M.

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad the package came fast and safely in one piece. Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this figurine. I absolutely love it! I’m glad it came not two days after I put in the order. I’ll treasure it forever!
customer_reviews.author: Ashten Warner

customer_reviews.title: Damage box
customer_reviews.text: I collect funko so if the package is damage. Value of the product losses it value. Arrive in the box with tear in on the corner. As a collect I’m not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: ***n

customer_reviews.title: Kakshi is so cool..
customer_reviews.text: Kakshi is so cool... I bought for my son's room with several other of naruto character and cannot tell you how much I love these little figurines. The price is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Really lucky to have found this
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift for my weeb lil sis. She absolutely loved it. And this was under 12 bucks, where on others site this same product went for $16 to $45

customer_reviews.title: Just keep your prices at a good rate and will defiantly buy
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Funko. Just keep your prices at a good rate and will defiantly buy more

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time thank you. Son was happy for his birthday.
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my son’s 11th birthday. He’s a big fan of Naruto :)
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not sure but it Seems fake
customer_reviews.text: Im pretty sure this is a fake. The box looks odd and it had been opened. the figures paint job is wonky. It was dirty! There is damage on the face as well. I wouldn't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quicker than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday. The package arrived quicker than I expected. He is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: Box messed up
customer_reviews.text: If you are a collector then beware. The box was bent and in pretty bad shape. I like POPs for fun and not as a collectable so I am not needing a return but kind of sucks it was so messed up, have to open it to enjoy. So I took two stars off because I will enjoy regardless but kinda upset I don't have the option of keeping it pristine.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Surrarrer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I already adore Kakashi so I may be a bit bias (Okay, a lot biased) but this POP is so freaking adorable. 10/10 would buy again...and again.

customer_reviews.title: Love kakashi

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite character of Nauro

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any Naruto fan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and the box is in mint condition.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product

customer_reviews.title: Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Very good condition.

customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves it. It's perfect. Took forever to arrive, but it's in great shape.

customer_reviews.title: Add packing please.

customer_reviews.title: awesome, but a tiny bit wobbly

product_meta.title: Anime: Naruto Shippuden Kakashi Toy Figure
feature_bullets: From Naruto: Shippuden, Kakashi, as a stylized POP vinyl from Funko!
Stylized collectable stands 3 ¾ inches tall, perfect for any Naruto: Shippuden fan!
Collect and display all Naruto: Shippuden POP! Vinyl's!
